ResearchProjectDef.label: Conveyor belts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Hauling thing within a factory can be dangerous and tedious, Conveyor belts take care of it.\nUnlocks: belts and fueling machines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Splitters and basic pullers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Directing things to the area of the factory it belongs to will streamline and diversify the factory layout.\nUnlocks: Simple puller, Growzone puller and Belt splitter for normal belts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced belts and pullers
ResearchProjectDef.description: More sophisticed logistical implementation allows advanced itemsorting.\nUnlocks: Wall-, UnderGround belts and splitters. Smart hoppers, mkII-, angle- and wall pullers. For your advanced item management.
